backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and surgery cases with access control, task checklists, and case comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing recent changes and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case list, case form modal, and startup recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Camera capture component using a custom hook to manage camera state, errors, and photo capture UI.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with demographics, arrival info, and a tasks checklist, and syncs task updates locally and to the server.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Provides a form for creating or editing cases with auto-prefill, validation, and save/update logic.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Renders a sortable list of case cards and shows loading or empty-state UI based on store status.
A controlled date input with a popover calendar for selecting and validating YYYY-MM-DD strings.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea input for pasting demographics plus an optional camera dialog for capturing reference images.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Displays an empty-state message and optionally guides users through migrating cases between environments.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: UI controls for selecting sort field and toggling sort direction.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders required tasks with checkboxes and notifies when task states change.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all cases to a CSV file and handles success or error notifications.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: UI dialog for uploading and parsing a CSV file, showing warnings/errors and importing parsed cases.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders app footer with branding, year, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays app header with branding, environment label, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Error screen shown on startup connection failures with retry and reload options.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Status bar showing online state, backend connection state, and providing sync and retry controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refetching dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to track initialization errors, detect missing tokens, and provide retry logic.
Combines identity, actor state, and backend probe to determine connection status with retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages local and server-synced surgery cases using React Query, including normalization, merging, adding, and updating cases with offline support.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Determines whether the app is running in Draft or Live mode based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browserâ€™s online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Synchronizes locally edited surgery cases with the backend, merging results and updating local storage and React Query state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines types for local surgery cases and case form data extending backend models.
Classifies backend errors into user-friendly categories and provides helpers for common initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Handles CSV export/import for surgery cases, generating rows from cases and parsing CSV text with validation and task column support.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe utilities for validating, converting, and formatting YYYY-MM-DD date strings and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks a persisted admin token from URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing surgery cases and sync timestamps in localStorage with demographic normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases while preserving local-only fields and prepares cases for syncing by applying pending changes.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case by MRN and extracts demographic fields for form prefilling.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, update, and map task checklists including CSV column mappings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata containing app summary, architectural notes, known issues, and lists of implemented features for a veterinary surgery case tracker.
